front.title: SRv6 Service SID Flag Extension for Multi-homed SRv6 BGP Services

abstract.t: In some multihoming SRv6 L3VPN and EVPN scenarios, there are requirements for the egress PE to advertise multiple SRv6 Service SIDs for the same service, such as egress fast reroute and anycast load balancing. This document defines No-Further-FRR-flag and Anycast-flag for SRv6 Service SIDs carried in BGP messages.
